article_title: Virginia sterilization victims still waiting for justice
article_text:
Thank you for reading 13 free articles on our site. If you are a 7-day subscriber, you may enjoy all of our valuable local news and information at no extra charge; you simply need to set up an online account. og.description: BROOKNEAL — After visiting Richmond over the course of two years to tell lawmakers how the state prevented them from having children as part of a forced-sterilization program, Janet and Sadie Ingram wonder why it is taking so long for Virginia to add some meaning to its 12-year-old apology for the practice.
